name: Mark Wlodawski
title: Senior Software Engineer
summary: Senior Full Stack Engineer with 10+ years of experience delivering revenue-impacting, consumer-facing applications in fintech and SaaS. Proven expertise in React.js, Next.js, and Node.js for building scalable, high-performance applications. Skilled at mentoring teams, shaping engineering roadmaps, and driving operational excellence through automation, CI/CD, and best practices. Adept at collaborating with management and cross-functional teams to deliver features that enhance customer experience and business growth. Passionate about building maintainable, reliable, and user-friendly solutions.
